tool_description: Creates new work orders for repair requests and maintenance tasks with automatic ID generation and initial categorization.

request_title.description: Brief title describing the maintenance request

asset_id.description: Unique identifier of the asset requiring maintenance

location.description: Physical location of the asset (building, floor, room)

description.description: Detailed description of the issue or maintenance requirement

requestor_id.description: ID of the person submitting the request

request_type.description: Type of request: emergency, urgent, routine, preventive

error_messages: Invalid request type: Use one of [emergency, urgent, routine, preventive].
Missing required field: All required parameters must be provided with non-empty values.
Asset ID not found: The provided asset_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid requestor: The requestor_id is not recognized in the system.
usage: Provide request_title, asset_id, location, description, requestor_id, and request_type to create a new work order. The tool generates a unique work order ID and timestamps.

work_order_id.description: Unique identifier for the created work order

creation_timestamp.description: Date and time when the work order was created

status.description: Initial status of the work order (typically 'open' or 'pending')

category.description: Auto-assigned category based on description analysis
